type.desc: Define the button HTML DOM type

outline.desc_cn: 为浮动操作按钮使用“轮廓线”设计

push.desc_cn: 为浮动操作按钮使用“推”设计

flat.desc_cn: 为浮动操作按钮使用“扁平”设计

padding.desc: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set
padding.desc_cn: 应用自定义填充（垂直[水平]）；以CSS单位表示的尺寸，包括单位名称或标准尺寸名称（无| xs | sm | md | lg | xl）；设置时也会删除最小宽度和高度

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要）；来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

glossy.desc: Apply the glossy effect over the button
glossy.desc_cn: 在按钮上应用光泽效果

external-label.desc: Display label besides the FABs, as external content
external-label.desc_cn: 将标签作为外部内容显示在浮动操作按钮之外

label.desc: The label that will be shown when Fab is extended
label.desc_cn: 展开浮动操作按钮时将显示的标签

label-position.desc: Position of the label around the icon

hide-label.desc: Hide the label; Useful for animation purposes where you toggle the visibility of the label
hide-label.desc_cn: 隐藏标签；用于切换标签可见性的动画

label-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the label container
label-class.desc_cn: 作为标签容器属性的类定义

label-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the label container
label-style.desc_cn: 作为标签容器属性的样式定义

square.desc: Apply a rectangle aspect to the FAB
square.desc_cn: 将矩形外观应用于浮动操作按钮

model-value.desc: Controls state of fab actions (showing/hidden); Works best with v-model directive, otherwise use along listening to 'update:modelValue' event

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)
icon.desc_cn: 图标的名称，需确保已经安装了相关的图标库，除非使用了 'img:' 前缀来引用本地的图片，如果设置为 'none'，则不会渲染图标

active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)
active-icon.desc_cn: 图标的名称，需确保已经安装了相关的图标库，除非使用了 'img:' 前缀来引用本地的图片，如果设置为 'none'，则不会渲染图标

hide-icon.desc_cn: 隐藏图标（不使用任何图标）

direction.desc: Direction to expand Fab Actions to
direction.desc_cn: 展开浮动操作按钮操作的方向

vertical-actions-align.desc: The side of the Fab where Fab Actions will expand (only when direction is 'up' or 'down')
vertical-actions-align.desc_cn: 浮动操作按钮的一侧，浮动操作按钮的操作将展开的位置（仅当方向为“向上”或“向下”时）

persistent.desc: By default, Fab Actions are hidden when user navigates to another route and this prop disables this behavior
persistent.desc_cn: 默认情况下，当用户导航到另一个路由并且此属性禁用此行为时，浮动操作按钮的操作是隐藏的

default.desc: This is where QFabActions may go into
default.desc_cn: 这就是QFabActions可能进入的位置

tooltip.desc: Slot specifically designed for a QTooltip

icon.desc: Slot for icon shown when FAB is closed; Suggestion: QIcon

active-icon.desc: Slot for icon shown when FAB is opened; Suggestion: QIcon

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when fab actions are shown/hidden; Captured by v-model directive

show.desc: Emitted after component has triggered show()

before-show.desc: Emitted when component triggers show() but before it finishes doing it
before-show.desc_cn: 在组件触发show()但在完成之前发出

hide.desc: Emitted after component has triggered hide()

before-hide.desc: Emitted when component triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it
before-hide.desc_cn: 在组件触发hide()但在完成之前发出

show.desc_cn: 展开浮动操作按钮的操作列表

hide.desc_cn: 折叠浮动操作按钮的操作列表

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide
toggle.desc_cn: 触发组件在显示/隐藏之间切换
